card.name: Whitecrane Zack, Lord of the Skies

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DECK EVOLUTION} —Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card's a creature, put this creature into the battle zone on top of the revealed creature. If the revealed card isn't a creature, return this creature to your hand. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a card that has "Sword Flash" Dragon in its name from your deck, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone that have "Sword Flash" Dragon in their names gets "speed attacker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets +3000 power. ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, the crossed creature breaks one of your opponent's shields. ■ You may cross this card with a creature that has "Sword Flash" Dragon in its name for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an evolution creature, you may put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Dragons or Tyranno Drake. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if it's put on top of a Tyranno Drake, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, if the card under it is a Dragon, you may destroy one of your opponent's non-Armored Dragon or non-Tyranno Drake creatures that has less power than this creature. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't be attacked or blocked. ■ This creature can't attack creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Fire Birds. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a cross gear from your deck, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone that have Bolbalzak "Sword Flash" Dragon in their name gets "speed attacker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take an evolution creature that has the same race as this creature from your deck, show that evolution creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets +1000 power and can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature is attacked, return a shield to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker".
